items.summary: Create a new landing-page section component for an "Our Work" gallery (image card grid) and add it to the landing page flow so it renders between existing sections (place it after ServicesSection and before CoverageSection).

Implement the "Our Work" gallery UI to match the provided layout intent: section heading and subtitle, followed by a responsive grid (1 column on mobile, 2 on small screens, 3 on large screens) of image cards with rounded corners, subtle border, shadow, and hover animations (image zoom + card shadow increase). Use English for the visible heading/subtitle and card titles/descriptions.
Seed the gallery with at least 3 items, including the provided Unsplash image URL for one of the cards, and ensure images are sized/cropped consistently (e.g., fixed height with object-cover).
